comment: I finally got around to going Pro. I definitely receive over $6 a month worth of value out of this website. Now I can write inbold,italics,or underline. Not sure what other benefits are besides the increased character limit, but I really don't care. If you care about something, vote with your dollar. Thanks to for giving us a place to discuss ideas and talk shit without being banned.
amr:
